description: Vignettes of the summer holidays follow vacationers as they battle mosquitoes, suffer ruined plans and otherwise hit snags in their precious time off.
A municipal clerk with literary ambitions stalks a loan recovery officer on whom he has decided to base his story's central character.
Sick of his parents’ constant squabbling, a young man travels back in time to the onset of their romance, with plans to set them up for marital bliss.
A man suffering from amnesia can't seem to choose between the women playing tricks on him.
After 20 years abroad, a photographer returns to his birth country of Egypt and gets stranded without identification in a now unfamiliar culture.
Childhood friends Abhay and Aaliya experience plenty of obstacles in their paths as they find their way in the world and back to each other.

type: Cats & Dogs: The Revenge of Kitty Galore
description: Cats and dogs must set aside their differences and merge animal instincts when Kitty Galore decides to claw her way to global domination.
After her fat-shaming husband brings home a new lover, a wife in Maharashtra recruits a group of women to challenge him in a kabaddi match.
Having risen from humble beginnings, an ambitious young man sets his sights on winning a major dance competition that could catapult him to fame.
When a Los Angeles family's patriarch dies, his dutiful eldest son plans the funeral – which becomes a fiasco thanks to a colorful cast of attendees.
The host of a dinner party invites his friends to bring the saddest loser they can find. But the ultimate schmuck turns everyone else into the losers.
A struggling math teacher holds down a second job to keep his family afloat. But when he receives a wedding invitation, he's determined to attend.
When a lie about Olive's reputation transforms her from anonymous to infamous at her high school, she decides to embrace a provocative new persona.
A clarinet player who lives with his grandparents in a small village is forced to move to Istanbul, where he meets a singer enjoying sudden fame.
Ambitious young record company intern Aaron must escort an unruly rock star to Los Angeles for the start of his anniversary concert.
The son of an astrologer faces opposition from his superstitious father regarding his scheme of launching a mango business.
Intrepid writer Harriet Welsch is determined to become the class blogger despite stiff competition from her snooty archrival.
Two new monks, one of them a former rock music star seeking inner peace, join a temple plagued by thieves who are stealing its valuable holy relics.
An intelligent boy born into poverty befriends the son of a once noble family and is inspired by the life of India's president to pursue an education.
This Bollywood spoof recounts the ups and downs of an assistant film director who loathes romance and a designer who adores all things sentimental.
After an actor is hit by a car driven by the police commissioner's sister, his scheming brother-in-law files a bogus suit against the commissioner.
Bored in their happy marriage, a couple decides to spice things up by fighting more, but their game takes the relationship on an unexpected path.
After a whirlwind romance, Jen and Spencer settle into married life — until Spencer's secret past as a hit man shakes up their suburban bliss.
Shortsighted curmudgeon Mr. Magoo and his young nephew, Justin, fight such nefarious foes as kung fu villains, robot spiders and teenage mutants.
As preparations for the Winter Feast build, Po is caught between his obligations as the Dragon Warrior and his family holiday traditions.
Anna chooses February 29 to propose marriage to her boyfriend, but after meeting a charming innkeeper, she must evaluate her original plans.
To upgrade his life, a simple man fakes his credentials as a lawyer when sudden extraordinary abilities give him the talent to thrive.
An adventure-loving young woman catches the attention of a handsome beau in this musical celebration of love, friends and fate.

When the Hong Kong government enacts a ban on smoking cigarettes indoors, the new law drives hard-core smokers outside, facilitating a meeting between Cherie, a makeup saleswoman, and Jimmy, an advertising exec.

type: My Babysitter's a Vampire: The Movie
description: When their parents head out for the evening, Ethan and his little sister get the babysitter of their nightmares: a fledgling vampire named Sarah.
Two former triads are tapped to run in an election for leader of the underworld, but both want normal lives. Each must outwit the other to lose.
Two indigent farmers consider suicide so that their families can collect a government subsidy that's paid to the relatives of deceased farmers.
Bored with her life and inspired by a friend's wedding, Esra quits her job and dumps her boyfriend, leading to a series of romantic misadventures.
Dreamy delivery girl Ramona captures Scott Pilgrim's heart, but he must vanquish all seven of her evil exes in martial arts battles to win her love.
Best friends Carrie, Miranda, Samantha and Charlotte take a break from their busy New York lives for an all-expenses-paid luxury vacation to Abu Dhabi.
When average-guy Kirk starts dating drop-dead-gorgeous Molly, his friends don't see it lasting, so Kirk does everything he can to avoid losing Molly.
A flamboyant con artist and his band of gleeful robbers gamble with fate when smugglers hire them to swipe antiques from a speeding train.
Released after being wrongly imprisoned in Iraq, an Egyptian contractor returns home to a country on the brink of revolution.
Bounty hunter Milo Boyd finds his latest assignment downright satisfying as he learns that the bail-jumper he must chase down is his ex-wife, Nicole.
When high school girl-geek Jordan becomes a werewolf after moving to Romania, she must elude her own brother, who sets out to slay her.
New York cops Allen and Terry toil in obscurity as lowly desk jockeys until a big break finally gives them a chance to tackle real police work.
While babysitting, an undercover agent is thrust back into the world of top-secret adventure when one his young charges downloads a classified file.
Determined to fight corruption in his country, a newspaper cartoonist debuts a new take-no-prisoners attitude.
cabin, two backwoods boys see their trip turn into a nightmare when they're accused of being psychotic killers.
An astute but old-fashioned law clerk steps up to help the owner of a cafe in a legal battle that has both business and personal ramifications.
